plurals.name: bill_cap_info_dialog_description_full_speed_summary
plurals.item:
"Full-speed data has been restored for %1$s members of your group for %2$s.
Data becomes free after your group uses %3$s, but slows down for any member who uses over %4$s."

"Full-speed data has been restored for %1$s member of your group for %2$s.
Data becomes free after your group uses %3$s, but slows down for any member who uses over %4$s."

plurals.name: bp_data_plan_item_details_active_members
plurals.item: %1$s, no charge past %2$s for a group of %3$d active members
%1$s, no charge past %2$s for %3$d active member

plurals.name: bp_overview_data_body
plurals.item: "Data is still %2$s. After %3$s, it's on us — so your group of %1$d will never spend over %4$s on data per cycle."
"Data is still %2$s. After %3$s, it's on us — so as an individual, you'll never spend over %4$s on data per cycle."

plurals.name: bp_overview_data_body_new
plurals.item: "Data is %2$s. After %3$s, it's on us — so your group of %1$d will never spend over %4$s on data per cycle."
"Data is %2$s. After %3$s, it's on us — so as an individual, you'll never spend over %4$s on data per cycle."

plurals.name: closure_dpp_body_unnamed_devices
plurals.item: Do you want to continue device protection for %1$d devices?
Do you want to continue device protection for %1$d device?

plurals.name: closure_terms_financing_many
plurals.item: "You’ll be billed for the remaining balance owed on %1$d of your group's devices."
"You’ll be billed for the remaining balance owed on your group's device."

plurals.name: closure_terms_financing_many_balance
plurals.item: "You’ll be billed for the remaining %2$s balance owed on %1$d of your group's devices."
"You’ll be billed for the remaining %2$s balance owed on your group's device."

plurals.name: closure_terms_financing_member
plurals.item: "You’ll be billed for the remaining balance owed on %1$s's devices."
"You’ll be billed for the remaining balance owed on %1$s's device."

plurals.name: closure_terms_financing_member_balance
plurals.item: "You’ll be billed for the remaining %2$s balance owed on %1$s's devices."
"You’ll be billed for the remaining %2$s balance owed on %1$s's device."

plurals.name: closure_terms_financing_self
plurals.item: You’ll be billed for the remaining balance owed on your devices.
You’ll be billed for the remaining balance owed on your device.

plurals.name: closure_terms_financing_self_balance
plurals.item: You’ll be billed for the remaining %1$s balance owed on your devices.
You’ll be billed for the remaining %1$s balance owed on your device.

plurals.name: data_only_sim_cost_group_bill_cap
plurals.item: No extra costs — just pay for the data your group uses up to %1$s for a group of %2$d

plurals.name: data_only_sim_cost_group_rate_bill_cap
plurals.item: No extra costs — just pay %1$s for the data you use up to %2$s for a group of %3$d

plurals.item: Schedule payoff of the existing balance on one or more of your devices:

plurals.name: referral_contest_over_header_desc
plurals.item: "Thanks for participating! We'll be in touch about your gifts. You can still earn %1$s Fi credit for your active referrals by sharing your unique referral code. %2$s"
"Thanks for participating! We'll be in touch about your gift. You can still earn %1$s Fi credit for your active referrals by sharing your unique referral code. %2$s"

plurals.name: referral_contest_over_header_desc_fallback
plurals.item: "Thanks for participating! We'll be in touch about your gifts. You can still earn Fi credit for your active referrals by sharing your unique referral code."
"Thanks for participating! We'll be in touch about your gift. You can still earn Fi credit for your active referrals by sharing your unique referral code."

plurals.name: shared_closure_your_group_insurance_terms_both
plurals.item: Device protection coverage will be discontinued for all group members with enrolled devices. Some members (%1$s) will have the option to continue coverage on an individual Fi plan.
Device protection coverage will be discontinued for all group members with enrolled devices. %1$s will have the option to continue coverage on an individual Fi plan.

plurals.name: x_days_left_sentence
plurals.item: Your current cycle ends in %1$d days
Your current cycle ends in %1$d day
